location.activity-description: Develop capacities for development effectiveness and accountability

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. % of Ministries with functional M&E systems. 2. Number of district councils with functional M&E systems 3. Number of staff in ministries and districts trained in Results Based Management (RBM) 4. Quality and timeliness of Malawi Growth and Development Strategy (MGDS) review [completeness and accuracy of information, reports produced by November each year] 5. Number of public institutions assessed for performance annually and provided feedback

baseline.comment: 1. 60% (2010) 2. 7 (2012) 3. 56 (2012) 4. 56 at district level; 25 in line ministries (2012) 4. Low quality and timeliness of Malawi Growth and Development Strategy (MGDS) review [completeness and accuracy of information, reports produced by November. each year (2012) 5. 0 (2011)

target.comment: 1. 65 % of Ministries with functional M&E systems. 2. 7 district councils with functional M&E systems 3. 120 staff in ministries and 210 staff in districts trained in RBM. 4. High quality and timeliness of MGDS review [completeness and accuracy of information, reports produced by November. 5. 44 public institutions assessed for performance annually and provided feedback.

actual.comment: 1. 70% 2. 11 3. 10 (4 women and 6 men) in ministries and 0 in districts. 4. Medium quality MGDS report 5. 44

target.comment: 1. 80 % of Ministries with functional M&E systems. 2. 14 district councils with functional M&E systems. 3. 40 staff in ministries and 140 staff districts trained in RB. 4. High quality and timeliness of MGDS review [completeness and accuracy of information, reports produced by November.
